name: Pixiu Finance
description: Pixiu Finance is a Decentralized token built on Ethereum network (erc20) with independent developers, own by koinvendors exchanging platform. The system is built with a high security level and a low chance of risk for wealth merchants, investors and traders by the company selling out and liquidate 99% of pixiu finance to reduce volatility and dumping with a 1% airdrop. Like every other decentralized token, Pixiu finance is controlled by the Pixiu traders.
